title: how to get Riot Points
body: lol i just wonder because im new and im trying to get Katarina{{champion:55}}  lol

replies.body: Riot Points are obtained through real world currency, and can be purchased through the in-game store.  If you don't want to spent money, you can also unlock Katarina through Influence Points, which is obtained simply through playing the game.  Hope that helps, and good luck!
